title: Analysis complete: agent_panel.rs
description:
Completed comprehensive analysis of Zed's agent_panel.rs (3020 lines).

Created detailed findings document: zed-agent-panel-analysis.md

Key discoveries:
- Chat interface uses ActiveView enum for flexible view switching
- Model selection via AgentType enum + PopoverMenu dropdown
- Entity-based state management (HistoryStore, ContextServerRegistry)
- GPUI Panel/Render traits for docking and layout
- Async command execution pattern applicable to gt CLI

Adaptation strategy includes:
- GasTownPanel architecture with role-based views
- Mayor console, polecat monitor, convoy tracker components
- Polling pattern for gt command integration
- Event subscriptions for real-time updates

Document includes code snippets, implementation roadmap, and GPUI component reference.

Ready for next task.
